name: market for machine operation, diesel, < 18.64 kW, underground mining | machine operation, diesel, < 18.64 kW, underground mining | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/11392/documentation

This is a market activity. Each market represents the consumption mix of a product in a given geography, connecting suppliers with consumers of the same product in the same geographical area. Markets group the producers and also the imports of the product (if relevant) within the same geographical area. They also account for transport to the consumer and for the losses during that process, when relevant.;This is the market for  'machine operation, diesel, < 18.64 kW, underground mining', in the Global geography.;This market contains no transport or losses, as they are irrelevant for the delivered product.;The 'machine operation, diesel, < 18.64 kW, underground mining' is delivering the service of operation of a underground mining machine. It operates with diesel and it has an engine power less than 18.64 kW. The operation includes infrastructure, lubricating oil, fuel consumption, air emissions and waste.    

This activity starts with the service generation.


This activity ends with the service supplied to its consumers. Transport or losses are considered irrelevant for this product.
